title: Pairwise Metrics and Kernels in Scikit-Learn
description: In this lab, we will explore the sklearn.metrics.pairwise submodule in scikit-learn. This module provides utilities for calculating pairwise distances and affinities between sets of samples.

meta.title: Pairwise Metrics and Kernels in Scikit-Learn
meta.description: Explore pairwise distance metrics and kernels in scikit-learn for machine learning tasks.
meta.keywords: pairwise metrics, pairwise kernels, scikit-learn, machine learning, data analysis
